N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 647.6 - Sale or transfer of real property not subject to the lien of a credit line mortgage

State Regulations
(a) In
the case of the sale or transfer of real property not subject to the lien of a
credit line mortgage or where the lien of such a mortgage is not to remain
outstanding, all instruments evidencing such sale or transfer may be recorded, provided a statement is made that: (1)
a
certificate of discharge of the credit line mortgage is being offered at the
time of recording of the deed; (2)
a check has been drawn payable for transmission to the credit line mortgagee or
his agent for the balance due and a satisfaction of such mortgage will be
recorded as soon as it is available; or
(3)
there is no existing credit line
mortgage. (b) Such
statement shall be made in accordance with procedures and on a form prescribed
by the commissioner. Notes
